Articles.Content:
For balance and historical accuracy the Endurance cargo will become an empty cardboard box.

Progress.

I love this mod, as much as Interstellar is my favorite movie !

On a note though : The Ranger performs very poorly using FAR, but the Lander has no trouble. Isn't that strange ?

I love this mod, as much as Interstellar is my favorite movie !

On a note though : The Ranger performs very poorly using FAR, but the Lander has no trouble. Isn't that strange ?

Nope. Lander is mostly one piece. Most of the mass and the drag come from one part, where as the ranger the mass and drag are spread out and it gets off kilter. plus i think the shape of the lander is just more stable by default, sort of like a parachute instead of a plank of wood.

Nope. Lander is mostly one piece. Most of the mass and the drag come from one part, where as the ranger the mass and drag are spread out and it gets off kilter. plus i think the shape of the lander is just more stable by default, sort of like a parachute instead of a plank of wood.

The ranger needs another mode in its engine.

The ranger needs another mode in its engine.

I am very aware of that.
Will the landing pods have any use?
Neat.
When is the next update coming out? Im just wondering on your progress so...
I'm currently busy with IRL stuff but hopefully I can get back to development soon.
The rangers are a bit hard to dock to endurance.
Yes! Interstellar is out on dvd!

You sure about that?

Everything I'm looking at says its not available until the 31st

You sure about that?

Everything I'm looking at says its not available until the 31st

Says that for me too.
March 30 in the UK and March 31 in the US.

When is the next update coming out? Im just wondering on your progress so...

Never ever.

I'm busy with IRL stuff as well. I have the next couple days off so I'm going to try to get some work done then. No promises though.

I'm busy with IRL stuff as well. I have the next couple days off so I'm going to try to get some work done then. No promises though.

Looking forward to that! Its OK, I couldnt give two flying ....s about this mod if it weren't for the developer. Study hard! And live your life the way u see fit!

Wait, where did you get the movie if it's not out until the 30th/31st of March? Also nice pics.
btw the Digital HD is out on the 17th

let's say it's scattered across the internet

Yeah, well, I'LL say that digital piracy is still alive and well. As if that's a surprise to anyone...
dude I downloaded the mod and install it but it stops loading the install at the ranger vtol engine and doesn't loads what do I do?

Ah, just those pics are a joy. No wonder the movie got an Oscar for visual effects. It just looks so crisp, sharp and realistic(especially since there is only 10% CGI). And yeah, luckily digital HD is coming earlier. Love the mod Benjee!
